categories: Category:Star Wars: A New Hope: 6 stories in 1

nodes.text: "The Rescue of Princess Leia" is a short story written by Elizabeth Schaefer that was published in the anthologies Star Wars: A New Hope: 6 stories in 1 and The Original Trilogy Stories. It adapts Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope from acquiring the Stormtrooper armor to the Garbage compactor.
